it.polimi.se2018.client.network.rmi

Class RmiClientImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • it.polimi.se2018.client.network.rmi.RmiClientImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RmiClientInterface, java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote

    public class RmiClientImpl
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements RmiClientInterface
    class RmiClientImpl: the class implements the RmiClientInterface, so it's responsible of the implementation of the interface methods, the implementation is linked with a Ping responsible to ping the server and the associate view to let the remote call methods to call the generics and behavioural methods of the view
    Author:
    fadda-miceli-mundo
    See Also:
    Remote, RmiClientInterface, Serialized Form
